### Bio

Dr. Haozhe Yang is a postdoctoral researcher at Princeton University. He received his Ph.D. in environmental engineering from University of California, Santa Barbara. 


## Readings

- Yang, Haozhe, Gang He, Eric Masanet, and Ranjit Deshmukh. 2025. “Economic Benefits and Cost Competitiveness of Green Hydrogen in Decarbonizing China’s Electricity and Hard-to-Electrify Sectors.” *Environmental Research Letters* 20 (12): 124012. <https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/ae1b1f>.
- Yang, Haozhe, Qian Luo, Gang He, et al. 2024. “Regional Disparities in Health and Employment Outcomes of China’s Transition to a Low-Carbon Electricity System.” *Environmental Research: Energy* 1 (2): 025001. <https://doi.org/10.1088/2753-3751/ad3bb8>.
